normalization_note: Voting and conversion weights normalized to weakest class = 1.0

equity_classes.voting_rights: Holders of Class A common stock have one vote per share.
equity_classes.conversion_rights: Class B common stock may be converted into Class A common stock at any time on a one-for-one share basis.

equity_classes.voting_rights: Holders of Class B common stock have 10 votes per share.
